column_description: Timestamp indicating when the P2P inward transaction was created in the system, used for time-based filtering and comparative analysis across different time periods (daily, monthly) in transaction reporting dashboards.
Represents the hour of the day (0-23) for P2P inward payment transactions, used for hourly time-based analysis and reporting of transaction patterns across different payment service providers.
Represents the latest hour timestamp for which P2P inward transaction data is available in the reporting dataset, used as a temporal reference point across various PSP-specific transaction charts.
A unique identifier or handle representing the recipient (payee) in peer-to-peer inward payment transactions, used to track and analyze payment flows across different payment service providers.

The payment service provider (PSP) handle identifier for the entity making P2P payments, used to categorize inward transactions by whether the payer is using Paytm or other PSP services for transaction flow analysis.

Unique identifier for peer-to-peer inward payment transactions, used as the primary counting field to measure transaction volumes and compare performance across different time periods in the P2P inward payments dashboard.
